title: Slab serif font, similar to Glypha
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162650im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OpenDay_5001.jpg)

The font is similar to Glypha, but, for example, the "n" has only one serif on the right foot.  
Thank you!

Font: 

 ChunkFive
